attributes.action: Stop blaming the Fire Service and Emergency Services for the Manchester Bombings
attributes.additional_details:
The streets were lined with panicking people. 
Manchester Fire Department, there is no need for an apology. The blame lies with the Bomber and his institution and his beliefs. 
This has to stop now.
attributes.background: The bombing at The Manchester Arena was an Isis bombing. Why are people expecting the Manchester Fire Department to take the Blame? They set off as soon as they got the call. The streets of Manchester are all set on a one way system. There was a bomb the streets were blocked. They did their best.

rejection.details: We recognise that you are concerned about public criticism of the emergency services. You can read the Government and Parliament's response to the Kerslake review of the response to the Manchester Arena Attack here: https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2018-03-28/debates/B2A35F39-3857-4B36-B6C0-C0E09516E6BC/KerslakeArenaAttackReview
